info.title: Alpha Vantage API
info.description: This is an API specification for the Alpha Vantage API, which provides various financial data.

get.description: Fetches financial data based on the specified function and symbol. The function can be one of 'OVERVIEW', 'INCOME_STATEMENT', 'BALANCE_SHEET', or 'CASH_FLOW'. The symbol should be the symbol of the equity you're interested in. The model should invoke this operation when the user requests financial data related to these functions and provides a valid equity symbol.

parameters.name: function
parameters.description: The function to be performed by the API

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: The symbol of the equity you're interested in (used with equity-related functions).
